fields.description:
I want to know how can I implement or develop a code block to change the APN from my application with the IDE Titanium Studio. Some idea of block code? I wish to invoke from an option inside  application.

Thanks for your help.
fields.summary: HOW IMPLEMENT APN IN TITANIUM STUDIO

comments.body:
Hi Juan,

Please use the Q&A for questions. JIRA is for filing bug reports and feature requests: http://developer.appcelerator.com/questions/newest

Thanks.
